div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 117px; height: 218px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

foreignObject.div:
master
access password
database and fork
databases
verify auth request
disconnect or
pass authticated
request to db
child
chroot /var/empty

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 107px; height: 127px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 167px; height: 248px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

foreignObject.div:
preauth_exechandle incoming
TCP-connections
parse incoming data as
newline separated JSON
objects
expect exactly one valid
auth request at the
start of a connection
spawn wss_server
chroot /var/empty

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 161px; height: 161px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 107px; height: 147px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 107px; height: 157px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

foreignObject.div:
db_execaccess local
database only
setup auth
requests to
other locations
chroot /db/dir

div.style: display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; vertical-align: top; width: 157px; height: 157px; overflow: hidden; white-space: nowrap; font-weight: bold; text-align: center;

foreignObject.div:
wss_server
handle incoming
WebSocket connections
(TLS 1.2 AEAD only)
proxy between client
and preauth
chroot /var/empty
